类 TypeExpressions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions.TypeExpressions

  • public final class TypeExpressions
extends Object
    Defines helper methods for the type expressions

      • convert

        public static Expression convert(Expression input,
                                 ConvertType to)
        Converts a value to a specified type.
        参数:
        input - the value to process
        to - an expression giving the target type
        返回:
        the new expression $convert

      • isNumber

        public static Expression isNumber(Expression input)
        Checks if the specified expression resolves to one of the numeric BSON types.
        参数:
        input - the value to check
        返回:
        the new expression $isNumber
